topic.title: ZeroTalk     >>> Search Bar <<<
topic.body: Let's see how many of you want search bar to be add to ZeroTalk. I think it will be awesome. Why there is no such feature? I think If we get enough votes it will be implemented.

1510252302_1Mb5HMCBsLTFkCZdkaiLcp38c3XwE.body:
> [styromaniac](#comment_205_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRFtVBhd): Someone will say you can just do it from ZeroHello, but how do you filter by zite on ZeroHello if it's even a feature? [...]

What I mean is to be implemented search feature like this is at ZeroTorrent.bit
Look at their search bar - it works work awesome and if the same think can be done for ZeroTalk.
